Unity SVN Integration

Version 0.2.0 (Beta 1)
* Reworked Inspector GUI
* Improved and fixed bugs in backend
* Added right-click context for project view
* Numerous small features and bug fixes from daily use

Version 0.1.1. (Alpha)
* Better handling of prefabs in OnInspector for gameObject
* Unload unused resources in Unity before SVN actions to avoid race on OS file locks

Version 0.1.0. (Alpha)
* First public release
